Package webd4201.altons

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CollegeInterface
    CollegeInterface.java This is the college interface class and contains const declarations of the college's name and phone number.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseConnect
    DatabaseConnect - establishes database connection for managing student and faculty data.
    Faculty
    Faculty.java This is the faculty class that represents a faculty member at the college.
    FacultyDA
    FacultyDA.java Handles all CRUD interactions with faculty records stored in a PostgreSQL database using various prepared statements
    Lab1Tester  
    Lab2Tester  
    LoginServlet
    LoginServlet.java - attempts to authorize a user's login credentials, and upon success creates a new session
    LogoutServlet
    LogoutServlet.java - destroys user's authorized session and creates a message updating user that logout was successful.
    Main
    Main.java This is the main class for the program execution and is primarily used to debug.
    Mark
    Mark.java This is the mark class that represents an individual student's grade.
    Student
    Student.java This is a student class that represents an individual student.
    StudentDA
    StudentDA.java Handles all CRUD interactions with student records stored in a PostgreSQL database using various prepared statements
    User
    User.java This is a user class that defines all base operations and default values for the child Faculty and Student classes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateException
    DuplicateException.java Exception for when an attempt is made to create a user that is already present in the database
    InvalidIdException
    InvalidIdException.java Exception for when an attempt to set the id is made outside the range of valid numbers.
    InvalidNameException
    InvalidNameException.java Exception for when an attempt to set the first or last name is made that is numeric, less than the miniumum number of characters allowed, or greater than the maximum number of characters allowed.
    InvalidPasswordException
    InvalidPasswordException.java Exception for when an attempt is made to set a user's password that is too short or too long.
    InvalidUserDataException
    InvalidUserDataException.java Exception for when an attempt is made to create a new user with invalid data passed as
    NotFoundException
    NotFoundException.java Exception for when an attempt is made to select a user not registered in the database
